actions.committee: House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations).

official_title: A bill to provide additional military assistance authorizations for Cambodia for the fiscal year 1975, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes to be appropriated, under the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961, to the President $222,000,000 for additional military assistance for Cambodia for fiscal year 1975. Repeals the overall ceiling of $377,000,000 on economic and military assistance to Cambodia (no more than $200,000,000 of which may have been for military assistance). Establishes a limitation of $75,000,000 on the exercise of the President's "draw-down" authority for military assistance in Cambodia for fiscal year 1975.

titles.title: A bill to provide additional military assistance authorizations for Cambodia for the fiscal year 1975, and for other purposes.
